title: Low Priority Queues when i didn't even leave the game, i dc'd for like 5 minutes.
body: I was playing a game of League of Legends when i randomly dc'd for about 5 minutes. I came back and finished the game and ended  up winning, then when i got to the post game screen it came up on my screen that i've been placed into  20minute low priority queue's. I'm so sick of this shitty game and getting muted or put in low priority queue's for no reason.

replies.body:
Same thing happened to me...heres a link with a more detailed analysis 
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/sJMIG0lz-low-priority-ques

I start the match with all my heart..go to loading screen and my lol crashes..my drive is missing and i have to restart my computer...
Team is fine but lol automatically puts me into this stupid low priority que...
Im 12 minutes in que if that makes ya feel better..

Riot sort your sh** out...

We dont deserve this...

i feel your pain acholat.

This has happend to me 3 times in 3 days...all because of my d drive..im not always crashing....
ive had to wait 3 Hours...collectively..
im pissed and want to be respected...
